com.amplifyframework.core.model.annotations

Annotation Type AuthRule


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface AuthRule
    AuthRule is used define an authorization rule for who can access and operate against a Model or a ModelField. The RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME annotation is added to retain AuthRule at runtime for the reflection capabilities to work in order to check if this annotation is present within a ModelConfig annotation. ElementType.ANNOTATION_TYPE annotation is added to indicate AuthRule annotation can be used only on other annotation types (i.e. ModelConfig or ModelField).
    See Also:
    GraphQL Transformer @auth directive documentation.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      AuthStrategy allow
      Defines the strategy for this rule.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String groupClaim
      Used to specify a custom claim.
      java.lang.String[] groups
      Used for static group authorization.
      java.lang.String groupsField
      Used for dynamic group authorization.
      java.lang.String identityClaim
      Used to specify a custom claim.
      ModelOperation[] operations
      Specifies which ModelOperations are protected by this AuthRule.
      java.lang.String ownerField
      Used for owner authorization.

    • Element Detail

      • allow

        public abstract AuthStrategy allow
        Defines the strategy for this rule. This is the only required field.
        Returns:
        AuthStrategy for this AuthRule

      • ownerField

        public abstract java.lang.String ownerField
        Used for owner authorization. Defaults to "owner" when using AuthStrategy.OWNER.
        Returns:
        name of a ModelField of type String which specifies the user which should have access
        Default:
        ""

      • identityClaim

        public abstract java.lang.String identityClaim
        Used to specify a custom claim. Defaults to "username" when using AuthStrategy.OWNER.
        Returns:
        identity claim
        Default:
        ""

      • groupClaim

        public abstract java.lang.String groupClaim
        Used to specify a custom claim. Defaults to "cognito:groups" when using AuthStrategy.GROUPS.
        Returns:
        group claim
        Default:
        ""

      • groups

        public abstract java.lang.String[] groups
        Used for static group authorization.
        Returns:
        array of groups which should have access
        Default:
        {}

      • groupsField

        public abstract java.lang.String groupsField
        Used for dynamic group authorization. Defaults to "groups" when using AuthStrategy.GROUPS.
        Returns:
        name of a ModelField of type String or array of Strings which specifies a group or list of groups which should have access.
        Default:
        ""

      • operations

        public abstract ModelOperation[] operations
        Specifies which ModelOperations are protected by this AuthRule. Any operations not included in the list are not protected by default.
        Returns:
        list of ModelOperations for which this AuthRule should apply.
        Default:
        {}
